name: Blades Adrift
description:
After dying in battle you are sent to the 10 layers of warrior limbo with nothing but your blade and bow... With precision, speed, skill and tactical decision will you make your way to the heaven of warriors or be trapped in limbo and fade way?

-Headshots are Key to a swift victory

-Fight all types of enemies

-Quick waves

-Simple and Satisfying gameplay

-Simple art style with different locations to battle in

-Slow Motion
